Good cut.  Audio sync is bang on for me..  Compression artefacting is noticable on monitor fullscreen, should be fine on normal TV tho.

The video/audio tracks are out of sync.
+5.700 is the amount to ajust by in VLC
I dont think you can adjust this with Windows MP

(In VLC open the tools tab at the top of the screen and select Syncronisation.)

Hope this helps!
